          <title>
            <string language="en">The universal indicator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Universalanzeige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'indicateur universel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O indicador universal</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">El indicador universal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the colour changes in a universal indicator depending on the pH of a substance.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Farbe Änderungen in 
einer Universalanzeige abhängig von dem pH einer Substanz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les changements de 
couleur d'un indicateur universel selon le pH d'une substance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as mudanças da cor em um
indicador universal dependendo do pH de uma substância.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i cambiamenti di

            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει αλλαγές χρώματος σε έναν
καθολικό δείκτη ανάλογα με το pH μιας ουσίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
